main.name: Pavel Moskalenko
main.bio: My name is Pavel, I'm a frontend developer, an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit and a passion for coding. I built my first website in 10th grade in school using html and css, but that wasn't enough for me so I studied different CMS's and stopped on WORDPRESS. Built a few projects while being in university. After graduation I was learning Java for building android apps, but soon I got back to my passion - building websites. For almost a year now, I've learned JavaScript, React, Git (and github) while repeating some basics of HTML and CSS. Still learning. Currently, I'm looking for a junior position at fine company.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

testimonials.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
